content: *cozy socks are the perfect fun easy and useful project an excellent gift to fit foot length women men 10 5 11 5 ins 26 5 29 cm shown in patons kroy socks using four 3 25mm u s 3 doublepointed knitting needles yarnspirations * sizes to fit foot length women men 10½ 11½ ins | 26 5 29 cm materials patons® kroy socks 50 g / 1 75 oz 2 balls for a pair of each size set of four 3 25 mm u s 3 double pointed knitting needles worked from top ribbing to toe gathered to finish there is no heel shaping written directions are provided in pdf download january 2009 french version january 2009 chaussettes en spirales au tricot 1 *patons free project sheet 99000600146* english *spiral socks to knit * french *chaussettes en spirales au tricot * 1 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/patons_kroysocks146_kn_socks fr_ca pdf
